column4: I have installed Ubuntu however when I go onto it I have text only and have been asked to login. I don't understand what to do. I thought it booted up, you entered your username and password then got onto your desktop...
Thanks awilcox, however it has told me there is a Fatal Error:(
X10: fatal IO error 104 (Connection Reset by peer) on X server ":0.0" after 9 requests (0 known processed) with 0 events remaining.
ok you probably have to configure X with sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
